summary.Title: Finnish speaking interviewer - Aarhus
summary.Presentation: Are you searching for a job where Danish skills are not a criteria? Where you get to speak to decision makers and company leaders while being in an ambitious, young and informal environment? Then A

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you searching for a job where Danish skills are not a criteria? Where you get to speak to decision makers and company leaders while being in an ambitious, young and informal environment? Then Aalund could be just the place for you!

 

We are on the lookout for Finnish speaking interviewers for our interview center right in the center of Aarhus!

The job is conducting short interviews with a variety of different respondents. To be a good interviewer you need to be able to match and handle different types of personalities. You will be trained in communication and conversational techniques.

All it requires from you is motivation, energy and a good telephone voice. You must be fluent on a native speaking level in Finnish.

We offer part time with a minimum of 12 hours/weekly up to full time with 32 hours/weekly. We offer a fixed hourly wage.

 

Please send your application and CV to at@aalund.com. If you have any questions, you are welcome to mail or call Anne.

 

About Aalund

Aalund is a business research company based in Denmark. From the call center, the interviewers conduct interviews with business people, mostly in Scandinavia, but also in other European countries.

Aalund Research Center

Frederiksgade 73

8000 Aarhus C

tlf. 87 31 09 00

at@aalund.com http://www.aalund.com
